definition: an association organized to promote art, science, or education, to advance or set forth in court
details:
noun
- an association organized to promote art, science, or education
= example: an association organized to promote art, science, or education
verb
- to advance or set forth in court
= example: to advance or set forth in court
= synonyms: bring
- to set up or lay the groundwork for
= example: to set up or lay the groundwork for
= synonyms: plant
